titles.title: Taxpayer Conscience Protection Act of 2013
To require States to report information on Medicaid payments to abortion providers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

bill.summary:
8/2/2013--Introduced. Taxpayer Conscience Protection Act of 2013 - Directs each state that makes a Medicaid payment from federal funds during the fiscal year for any items or services furnished by an abortion provider to: (1) report to the Secretary of Health and Human Services (HHS) on all such payments, and (2) publish the report on a public Internet website of the state.
Requires an annual report to specified congressional committees on such reports, which shall also be published on a public Internet HHS website.
